pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model-Based Clustering for Multivariate Partial Ranking Data // Implementation of a model-based clustering algorithm for ranking data (C. Biernacki, J. Jacques (2013) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2012.08.008). Multivariate rankings as well as partial rankings are taken into account. This algorithm is based on an extension of the Insertion Sorting Rank (ISR) model for ranking data, which is a meaningful and effective model parametrized by a position parameter (the modal ranking, quoted by mu) and a dispersion parameter (quoted by pi). The heterogeneity of the rank population is modelled by a mixture of ISR, whereas conditional independence assumption is considered for multivariate rankings.
